bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with zhang li 瘴癘 , miasmatic epidemic; possibly a copying error. Ben cao gang mu 本草綱目 Substance Entry jie du zi 解毒子 quoting a Xin xiu ben cao 新修本草 quote from Zheng lei ben cao 證類本草 : 主解蠱毒， 止煩熱，辟瘴癘，利喉閉及痰毒 , “It controls gu poison, stops vexing heat, eliminates miasmatic epidemics, and frees throat closure and phlegm poison”, writes: 解蠱毒，止煩熱，辟瘴癧，利喉閉及痰毒 , “It dissolves gu poison, stops vexing heat, eliminates miasmatic pervasion-illness , and frees throat closure and phlegm poison”.
